content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> oscillates on a spring with frequency <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the spring constant of the spring?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 2 pi m, over f squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 4 pi squared m, over f squared, end fraction " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>m</mi></mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="2 pi m f squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="4 pi squared m f squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4 pi squared m f squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
